startCommand: node -e "const {PrismaClient}=require('@prisma/client');const p=new PrismaClient();p.\$executeRawUnsafe('ALTER TABLE emails ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS is_ignored BOOLEAN DEFAULT false; ALTER TABLE emails ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ignored_at TIMESTAMPTZ;').then(r=>console.log('Done',r)).catch(e=>console.error(e)).finally(()=>p.\$disconnect())"
